text: Question 7 Consider the following C program: #include < stdio.h > int main( ) { int i, j, k = 0; j=2*3/4+20/5+8/5; ko= --j; for(i = 0; i < 5; i++) { switch(i + k) { case 1: case 2: printf("n%d", i+k); case 3: printf("n%d", i+k); default: printf("n%d", i+k); } } return 0; } The number of times printf statement is executed is .
